title: Is We Dumb? | Shakespeare. Fruit Bowl. Stripper. Bone Thugs-N-Harmony.
description:
If we lived in a house with almost 300 snakes, would you be surprised to find out we died from snake bite? Let's talk about that, getting paid for naming babies, people not understanding what Shakespeare was all about, why do bands always seem to drop Christmas albums, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?! 

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/K2zsrFnC5wE

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
